starSlogan:
Once thought of oneself
as a shining star among millions
godSlogan:
Yet now suspecting oneself
to be a flawed creation
timeSlogan:
Perhaps feeling
born at the wrong time?
placeSlogan: Or not born in the right place?
appearanceSlogan:
Or dissatisfied,
with one's
innate appearance?
welcomeSlogan:
Start creating the next chapter of your life
The regrets of this life will be fulfilled
Welcome to Hereafter
